text: Spatial simulations
are generally confined to running
on a single piece of hardware,
which limits their scale and complexity.
When developers want to build bigger simulations,
they must worry about replicating data,
synchronizing simulation time,
and managing larger quantities of infrastructure.
All of this takes time away
from building models and developing content.
AWS SimSpace Weaver makes it easier
to run large-scale spatial simulations in the cloud.
You can now distribute your simulation workloads
across instances while AWS
manages the heavy lifting.
Create your simulation worlds
using your own custom engine or popular tools.
Then integrate with the SimSpace Weaver SDK
and upload your compiled applications to AWS.
You control how your simulations are partitioned
and the amount of capacity to deploy.
Finally, SimSpace Weaver provisions
the requested Amazon EC2 resources,
networks them together,
and launches your application
in each spatial partition.
Whether you're simulating the population
of an entire city
or creating immersive digital environments,
you can build simulations with millions
of entities that move, interact,
and communicate across seamless virtual worlds
with the power of AWS.
Get started by downloading the SDK
and sample simulations to expand
your capabilities with AWS SimSpace Weaver.
